Class Disassembler

java.lang.Object
Disassembler
public class Disassembler
extends java.lang.Object
class implementing CHIP-8 disassembler

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Disassembler​(java.util.ArrayList<InstructionFactoryInterface> factories_)
    create disassembler from instruction factories which take opcode

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Optional<Instruction> decodeInstruction​(short opcode)
    takes 2 bytes and returns either and decoded instruction or empty object on error
    java.lang.String disassemble​(byte[] data)
    disassemble whole bytecode
    java.lang.String disassemble​(byte[] data, int offset)
    disassembles bytes at offset
    java.lang.String disassemble​(byte data, int offset)
    disassembles one byte to emit byte assembly meta instruction
    java.lang.String disassemble​(short data, int offset)
    disassemble 2 bytes (short) to either valid instruction or 2 emit bytes meta instructions
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getCodeCoverage​(byte[] data)
    generates array of addresses which can be accessed by cpu to be executed as instruction

    • decodeInstruction

      public java.util.Optional<Instruction> decodeInstruction​(short opcode)

      Returns:
      decoded instruction or empty

    • disassemble

      public java.lang.String disassemble​(byte data, int offset)
      disassembles one byte to emit byte assembly meta instruction
      Parameters:
      data - one byte from bytecode
      offset - corresponding offset in bytecode
      Returns:
      disassembled string

    • disassemble

      public java.lang.String disassemble​(short data, int offset)
      disassemble 2 bytes (short) to either valid instruction or 2 emit bytes meta instructions
      Parameters:
      data - short to be disassembled
      offset - corresponding offset in bytecode
      Returns:
      disassembled string

    • getCodeCoverage

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      array of addresses
